extracted.value: The court held a four-day Preliminary Injunction Hearing on August 6, 7, 12, and 13, 2025, which resulted in the issuance of a preliminary injunction on August 21, 2025, requiring Defendants to cease all construction and operations at the TNT site within sixty days.

evidence.text: Over four days of evidentiary presentation and oral argument between August 6 and August 13, 2025, the Court heard testimony from ten witnesses and viewed over a hundred exhibits.

At 8:47 p.m. on August 21—the last day of the TRO period—the court entered a preliminary injunction requiring Defendants to (i) immediately cease bringing new detainees to the facility, (ii) immediately cease new construction, and (iii) remove all new lighting, fencing, and utilities within sixty days—effectively shuttering the facility.
